response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its significance to you, valued at $15,000, and are excited to offer it to you at a special price. Our proposal is to extend this remarkable asset to you for $12,500. This offer reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring fair value. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 12500}
